Uses of Interface
net.sf.jgcs.GroupConfiguration

  • Packages that use GroupConfiguration 
    Package Description
    net.sf.jgcs
    Defines a generic interface for group communication.
    net.sf.jgcs.spi
    Supports service providers with a set of abstract classes that ease the implementation of bindings to concrete group communication protocols.

    • Uses of GroupConfiguration in net.sf.jgcs

      Methods in net.sf.jgcs that return GroupConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GroupConfiguration DataSession.getGroup()
      Gets the group associated with this session.
      Methods in net.sf.jgcs with parameters of type GroupConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ControlSession Protocol.openControlSession(GroupConfiguration group)
      Obtains a control session for a group.
      DataSession Protocol.openDataSession(GroupConfiguration group)
      Obtains a data session for a group.

      class  AbstractProtocol<P extends AbstractProtocol<P,DS,CS,G>,DS extends AbstractDataSession<P,DS,CS,G>,CS extends AbstractControlSession<P,DS,CS,G>,G extends GroupConfiguration>
      This class defines a AbstractProtocol It partially implements a protocol with the mappings between a configuration and a pair of control and data sessions.
